Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory530.jpg'}
{3: "The next morning, shadows of the forest dance across the pristine white stone walls. Following Lamia's lead, two people pull a cart through the city gates."}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4401_13.jpg'}
{3: 'The bustling sounds draw closer as the atmosphere grows lively. People of all kinds gather in the streets and set up their stalls to begin another day.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Let's stop the cart here. Ugh, I'm exhausted. Come on, let's sit down for a bit.", 4: '101', 18: '100003768', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "I've been pulling the cart this whole time, though?!", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "B-but... I've been following you around all this time, you know? Getting up this early takes a lot of energy.", 4: '101', 18: '100003769', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'd have been able to sleep for as long as I wanted to if it hadn't been for you... Yawn.", 4: '101', 18: '100003770', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Lamia lets out a lazy yawn, tugs at her sleeve, and leans against the shoulder beside her, her head nodding drowsily.'}
{2: "Don't we need to set up our stall?", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hmm? Of course, we need to set it up... that's why I left it to you... Mmm... don't move... let me sleep a bit more... so sleepy... Zzz... zzz...", 18: '100003771'}
{2: 'Passerby', 3: 'Excuse me, how much is this?', 18: '100003816'}
{2: 'Uh... just a moment.', 3: '26'}
{3: 'Listening to the conversation between you and customers, noticing how you deliberately soften your movements, apparently being mindful of something...'}
{3: "Lamia's lips curls gently upward as she makes an almost unnoticeable adjustment to her posture, looking even more at ease."}
{3: 'Waking up early seems not as bad as she thought at all.'}
{3: 'Click—'}
{3: 'The soft mechanical whirring wakes Lamia. She rubs her eyes, taking a moment before she can make out what the person beside her is doing.'}
{2: 'The architecture and clothing styles are quite telling...', 3: '35'}
{2: 'And those trident symbols everywhere...', 3: '36'}
{2: 'The Sea God... could it be Poseidon?', 3: '37'}
{2: "No, that's not gonna cut it. I gotta look into it some more...", 3: '38'}
{2: "Hey, I see you're awake.", 3: '40'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Yawn... Didn't you say this is how people show respect in your homeland?", 4: '101', 18: '100003775', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "This is just an ordinary marketplace, isn't it? Nothing special about it, right?", 4: '101', 18: '100003776', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "Hmm... It's also something we do to show curiosity.", 3: '43'}

{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Your homeland's traditions seem pretty casual... By the way, is everything selling just fine? Huh? W-wait, everything's sold out already? That's fast! We were here last time until evening before we sold everything.", 4: '101', 18: '100003777', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "Well, I guess it's because...", 3: '45'}
{2: "It's not every day that people see a stall owner sleeping while clinging to someone else in the morning market.", 3: '46'}
{2: 'People probably came to see that and ended up buying things while they were here.', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Ahem...! W-well... guess you can count that as my contribution, yeah?', 4: '101', 18: '100003778', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Eek—D-don't stare at me like that... I-I was just saying whatever came to mind!", 4: '101', 18: '100003779', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Oh, uhh... Look over there! The food at that stall looks so delicious!', 4: '101', 18: '100003780', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Lamia starts looking around in an obviously exaggerated manner, making a clumsy attempt to change the subject.'}
{3: 'Soon enough, her eyes light up as if catching something truly interesting, and she starts dragging you from stall to stall.'}

{2: 'Lamia', 3: "By the way, the only spare outfit that you have now is the one Begonia brought you from home, right? Want to get some clothes while we're here?", 4: '101', 18: '100003781', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'As she speaks, she keeps moving from stall to stall, peering at all the merchandise and browsing through everything with eager interest.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Heheh... This one's really cute! Want to try it on?", 4: '101', 18: '100003782', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}

{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Ah, this statue looks just like you—frowning and everything. It\'s got that "I\'m thinking about important things, don\'t disturb me" look down perfectly.', 4: '101', 18: '100003783', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: "Seeing you all speechless, Lamia finds herself experiencing a sense of joy that she's never felt before."}
{2: "You know, you're the one acting like it's your first time here.", 3: '61'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Um, s-sorry... Was I getting too carried away? L-let's just buy this and head back.", 4: '101', 18: '100003784', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "I wasn't trying to criticize you. I was just being curious.", 3: '64'}

{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hmm... Maybe it's because I've never really explored the market with anyone before. I'd just pack up and leave when business is over. Even when I go to the Temple for rituals, I'd always just go there and head straight back home without stopping to rest.", 4: '101', 18: '100003785', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Lamia answers thoughtfully while counting the items she has bought.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, she freezes in place and tilts her head, as if listening to something.'}
{3: 'Lamia hurries away. After a while, she returns holding something in her hands.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/2-11Spine/UimovieSpine/UimovieLamiy01/UiMovieLamiy01.prefab'}
{2: "What's that?"}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hm? You don't know what a conch shell flute is? I thought everyone living by the sea would know what this is.", 18: '100003787'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Fishermen play shells and conchs as musical instruments all the time, kind of like a little game for them.', 18: '100003788'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Lamia gently closes her eyes and begins to blow into the conch.'}
{3: 'Da... dada... dada...'}
{3: 'Dadadadadadada...'}
{3: 'A melodious tune fills the plaza. The people at the market pause their activities and turn to look this way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/2-11Spine/UimovieSpine/UimovieLamiy01/UiMovieLamiy01.prefab'}
{3: 'The music ends shortly after. Lamia purses her lips and holds out the conch shell flute.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Here, it's yours. Thank you for helping me with the stall earlier. And didn't you teach me a song before?", 18: '100003789'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Consider this my gift to you for being my music teacher.', 18: '100003790'}
{2: '(Take the flute)', 3: '95'}
{3: 'Hesitantly, you, too, begin to play to the tune you just heard.'}
{3: 'Lamia closes her eyes, seeming both to listen to the song and to look for something in its melody.'}
{3: 'She sways gently to the music as she slowly draws closer to you.'}
{3: 'Before the song is halfway through, you can already feel the warmth coming off Lamia.'}
{3: 'Lamia moves even closer.'}
{3: 'Her long eyelashes quiver slightly as the wind carries her hair to brush against her cheeks.'}
{3: "You're trying to decide if you want to stop the music to talk to Lamia when..."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory608.jpg', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Thunder crashes through clear skies and, in an instant, the world becomes void of all colors.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The deafening thunder is an endless stream of crashes, each boom louder than the last.'}
{3: 'This is no natural phenomenon. Dark clouds materialize on the horizon, their terrifying presence slowly bearing down upon the city.'}
{3: 'Beneath the dark clouds, an ink-black tide surges toward the coastline like a living creature.'}
{3: 'Trembling with fear, Lamia presses close for comfort.'}
{3: 'The marketplace freezes as if someone hit pause, and then erupts into chaos.'}
{3: 'Cries of fear and prayers blend into a cacophony that rivals even the thunder above.'}
{3: "You cover Lamia's ears, lean down to meet her eyes, and mouth words in a hushed voice."}
{3: 'Having swayed unsteadily for a moment, Lamia finally comes to her senses, her face cold in panic.'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '139'}
{2: 'Is there a storm coming? Why is everyone so freaked out?', 3: '140'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "N-no, this isn't just a storm. The Sea God is angry. But why does the Sea God get mad when we've just done a ritual...?", 4: '101', 18: '100003792', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "What do you mean? Isn't this just typical coastal weather?", 3: '142'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "No, it's not like that at all. I—we need to go back. We must hurry. The village is in danger.", 4: '101', 18: '100003793', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: "Lamia's bag slips from her grasp with everything in it scattering all over. Leaving everything behind, Lamia grabs your arm and rushes toward town city gates without a word."}
